Title: Black Cat, White Cat
Actors: Bajram Severdzan, Srdjan Todorovic, Branka Katic, Florijan Ajdini
tomatoConsensus: Rambling and eccentric, Emir Kusturica's comedy captures the life and energy of the Gypsy family at the heart of the tale.
